Operating Costs
Rent
(This figure is arrived at by deter¬
mining an initial need for 1500 square
feet of space priced at $5.25 per square
foot. Estimates have run from $3.90 in
the DuPont Circle Building to $5.25 for
a variety of locations. Negotiations
with American University indicate that
adequate space may be available at that
institution within the scale indicated
above. Currently, NERN pays $1,500
annually to the University of Illinois.
The cost indicated is the differential
between current payment and the scale
described.)
